overview: Krzysztof, an introverted 10 year old, faces his father's decision to hide a Jewish boy from a nearby village in the family's house. As the new boy prompts the father's attention, Krzysztof develops a flammable jealousy towards the other boy which reaches a dangerous peak and leads him to an irreversible act.
tagline: An exploration of the intricate relationship between a Christian and a Jewish boy in 1942 Poland.
title: Janek/Bastard
